Detailed Description

This is the SHA-512 class (output hash size is 512 bits). 



 // The following code, show how to hash a file

 wxSHA512Hash hash;
 wxSHA512 sha512;

 wxFileInputStream fis(wxT("name.ext"));

 sha512.Hash(fis, hash);

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxSHA512::wxSHA512 (  )  [inline]

This is the default constructor.

It does nothing itself, it only extend the wxSHABase1024 constructor.

See also:
wxSHABase1024(const wxSHAType &Wsize)

Member Function Documentation

bool wxSHA512::Hash ( const void *  input,
const size_t &  input_size,
wxSHA512Hash &  hash 
)

Perform the hash calculation over a binary buffer.

It initialize a memory input stream and passes it to the generic hash calculation function.

Parameters:
input a binary buffer pointer.
input_size the binary buffer data length.
hash a wxSHA512Hash valid class; the resulting hash value is stored here.
Returns:
True on success, false if an error occurred.
See also:
Hash(wxInputStream &input, wxSHA512Hash &hash)

wxSHA512Hash &  hash

Perform the hash calculation over a generic input stream.

The input stream length must be determinable.
